statements: SELECT * FROM patient_treatment_plans;
SELECT patient_id, treatment_plan_name FROM patient_treatment_plans WHERE treatment_start_date >= '2022-01-01';
SELECT treatment_plan_name, treatment_description FROM patient_treatment_plans WHERE patient_id = '123e4567-e89b-12d3-a456-426614174000';
SELECT * FROM patient_treatment_plans ORDER BY treatment_start_date DESC;
SELECT treatment_plan_name, treatment_end_date FROM patient_treatment_plans WHERE treatment_end_date < '2023-01-01';
SELECT * FROM patient_treatment_plans ORDER BY treatment_start_date DESC, treatment_plan_name;
SELECT patient_id, treatment_plan_name, treatment_start_date FROM patient_treatment_plans WHERE treatment_end_date >= '2023-01-01';
SELECT DISTINCT treatment_plan_name FROM patient_treatment_plans WHERE patient_id = '123e4567-e89b-12d3-a456-426614174000';
SELECT patient_id, COUNT(*) AS total_treatments FROM patient_treatment_plans GROUP BY patient_id HAVING total_treatments > 1;
SELECT patient_id, treatment_plan_name, treatment_start_date, treatment_end_date FROM patient_treatment_plans WHERE treatment_description ILIKE '%recovery%';
SELECT * FROM Patient
SELECT patient_name, gender, age FROM Patient
SELECT patient_name, email FROM Patient ORDER BY patient_id DESC
SELECT diagnosis, treatment_description, start_date FROM TreatmentPlan WHERE plan_id = 1
SELECT patient_name, gender, email FROM Patient WHERE gender = 'Female'
SELECT * FROM Patient WHERE age > 30 ORDER BY patient_name ASC;
SELECT patient_name, gender, email FROM Patient WHERE gender = 'Male' ORDER BY patient_id DESC;
SELECT patient_name, age, gender FROM Patient WHERE age BETWEEN 25 AND 40 ORDER BY age ASC, patient_id DESC;
SELECT plan_id, diagnosis, start_date, end_date FROM TreatmentPlan WHERE start_date >= '2022-01-01' AND end_date <= '2022-12-31';

SELECT Patient.patient_name, TreatmentPlan.diagnosis, TreatmentPlan.treatment_description FROM Patient INNER JOIN TreatmentPlan ON Patient.patient_id = TreatmentPlan.patient_id WHERE TreatmentPlan.diagnosis LIKE '%Flu%' ORDER BY Patient.patient_id ASC, TreatmentPlan.plan_id DESC;
SELECT * FROM patient_profiles;
SELECT patient_name, age, gender FROM patient_profiles WHERE age > 50;
SELECT patient_name, primary_condition FROM patient_profiles WHERE primary_condition LIKE 'Diabetes%';
SELECT patient_name, age FROM patient_profiles ORDER BY age DESC;
SELECT patient_name, gender, primary_condition FROM patient_profiles WHERE gender = 'Female';
SELECT * FROM patient_profiles;
SELECT patient_name, age, gender, primary_condition FROM patient_profiles WHERE age > 50;
SELECT patient_id, plan_description, start_date, end_date FROM treatment_plans ORDER BY start_date DESC;
SELECT patient_id, data_date, heart_rate, blood_pressure FROM monitoring_data WHERE heart_rate > 100 AND blood_pressure='Normal';

SELECT pp.patient_name, td.plan_description, md.heart_rate FROM patient_profiles pp JOIN treatment_plans td ON pp.patient_id = td.patient_id JOIN monitoring_data md ON pp.patient_id = md.patient_id WHERE pp.gender='Female';
SELECT * FROM Patient_Treatment_Plans;
SELECT patient_id, treatment_plan FROM Patient_Treatment_Plans WHERE condition_name = 'Diabetes';
SELECT patient_id, condition_name FROM Treatment_History ORDER BY treatment_date DESC;
SELECT DISTINCT condition_name FROM Treatment_History;
SELECT patient_id, monitor_date, monitor_data FROM Remote_Monitoring WHERE patient_id = 12345;
SELECT * FROM Patient_Treatment_Plans ORDER BY last_updated DESC, patient_id ASC, condition_name
SELECT patient_id, condition_name, JSON_EXTRACT(treatment_plan, '$.medication') AS medication FROM Patient_Treatment_Plans WHERE patient_id = 123
SELECT patient_id, treatment_date, treatment_description FROM Treatment_History WHERE treatment_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-12-31'
SELECT condition_name, COUNT(*) AS total_count FROM Treatment_History GROUP BY condition_name HAVING total_count > 5 ORDER BY total_count DESC
SELECT p.patient_id, p.condition_name, c.condition_description FROM Patient_Treatment_Plans p INNER JOIN Condition_Details c ON p.condition_name = c.condition_name ORDER BY p.patient_id ASC
SELECT * FROM patients;
SELECT patient_name, condition FROM patients;
SELECT treatment_name, description, duration FROM treatments;
SELECT doctor_name, specialization FROM doctors;
SELECT patient_name, treatment_name, monitoring_date FROM patients JOIN monitoring ON patients.patient_id = monitoring.patient_id;
SELECT * FROM patients WHERE condition = 'Fever';
SELECT patient_name, condition FROM patients WHERE patient_id = 1;

SELECT appointment_date, patient_name, doctor_name FROM appointments JOIN patients ON appointments.patient_id = patients.patient_id JOIN doctors ON appointments.doctor_id = doctors.doctor_id WHERE doctor_name = 'Dr. Smith';
SELECT * FROM appointments WHERE appointment_date >= '2022-10-01';
SELECT treatment_name, description, duration FROM treatments ORDER BY duration DESC;
